ingredients.item: 200g jar Cooks’ Ingredients Tikka Curry Paste

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large, wide saucepan or frying pan, add the aubergines and fry for 8-10 minutes, stirring frequently until browned. Stir in the carrots, chickpeas, bouillon powder, curry paste and 300ml water. Bring to a gentle simmer, cover with a lid and cook for 15 minutes or until the carrots are tender.
Finely chop half the coriander and mix in a small bowl with the coconut yogurt and garlic. Roughly chop the remainder and add to the stew. Serve in bowls with the yogurt spooned over the top.
